website_summaries.verdict: This high-quality blade is designed for professional chefs, but it's a good option for the beginning chef, too.
pros: Soft, nonslip handle comes in eight colors
Comfortable to hold and easy to maneuver
cons: Users have said that this knife dulls fairly quickly and requires regular resharpening

customer_reviews.title: Dull when brand new
customer_reviews.text: Dull when brand new. I didn't know that new knives we're sold without an edge. Won't sharpen worth a darn either.
customer_reviews.author: Pipes

customer_reviews.title: Great price and Quality, A definite must
customer_reviews.text: Great knife, it definitely needs to be sharpened after you fillet a few salmon. I live in Alaska and this knife will cut through up to a hundred salmon a summer. No problems except that it should have came with a sheath but no biggie, it's a good knife all in all, a definite must for any one who subsist on salmon.
customer_reviews.author: Xyooj

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally sharp for an economically priced knife
customer_reviews.text: Great knife for an angler’s collection as performs as intended when filleting a variety of fish. Keeps its edge very well and seems like a durable tool that will last. Great price for a knife that could easily be priced among more recognizable name branded knives. Don’t think twice about buying this product, you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Manny B.

customer_reviews.title: Very  Full couldn't get through my 3 bass well at all.
customer_reviews.text: Dull could cut through a bass good as well and the bene is not that well. Had big expectation
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Fillet knife not very sharp, butchers fish
customer_reviews.text: The fillet knife for fish is terrible. Not very sharp at all. Gets the job done but butchers your fish. Used it for the first time and my regular knives are way sharper. These knives are supposed to be sharper than hell. I guess I'll have to go buy a sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed! Knife is narrow from edge to back making it awesome for carving rindes off of watermelons cantaloupe ect. its like an 8" paring knife. Balance and fit in hand are great. So sharp that I just ordered a high end knife sharpener to "fix" all my other knives. Sets the standard of what a great go to daily kitchen knife should be!
customer_reviews.author: Michael N.

customer_reviews.title: Sharpness didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the ease this blade trimmed pork and beef for my smoker. However after using a few times I find I'm having to constantly sharpen the blade. Last weekend I smoked 12 pork butts and I had to sharpen the blade after trimming fat off each butt. These were boneless. I'll be looking for something that holds it's edge better.
customer_reviews.author: Sparty76BC

customer_reviews.title: Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp. Sliced right through my finger when trimming ribs! Didn’t need such a long knife, should’ve thought about that before purchasing. Still super sharp and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Sharper than a deers sense's
customer_reviews.text: This thing is like a Lazer on fish. Hands down the sharpest fillet knife I ever owned. It holds it's edge awesome and pair it with a radda sharpner and you'll be happy. It's a little stiff to rib fish so I use my other fillet knife for that.
customer_reviews.author: Mike nudgent

customer_reviews.title: Skinny and Straight
customer_reviews.text: This thing is thin and pokey AF. I swear you can slice about anything with it. I mostly use it to open food that is really tightly shrink wrapped. Would be a good weapon in a street fight. Almost fits in front pocket, would be perfect if it would fit in back pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Covare

customer_reviews.title: this is a great product. I've used it to cut the skin ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great product. I've used it to cut the skin off fish, fabricate steaks from larger cuts of meat, and debone several types of animals. This is a great tool for learning how to butcher different types & sections of meat, but it's not the best tool out there. Good for a student, probably leaves something to be desired if you're already proficient.
customer_reviews.author: JaySherman

customer_reviews.title: This blade is sharp!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this knife to use to harvest my microgreen crops. This thin, extremely sharp blade slices right through the tender stems of even my smallest crops without damaging them. My packaged products have a longer shelf life due to these clean cuts (much cleaner than harvesting with a pair of scissors). Highly recommended; I imagine it would work wonders filleting a fish.
customer_reviews.author: TeenyGreenz Farm

customer_reviews.title: Sharp durable knife
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying a knife on Amazon but this knife was super sharp! Cut right through briskets, ribs, anything. Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James Miyamoto

customer_reviews.title: Fillet Your Fish, Not Your Hands!
customer_reviews.text: The knife made my day easy. I was out if practice and had a few dozen fish to fillet on vacation. Easy to clean, sharp, appeared to hold it's edge well. Hurt everytime I stabbed myself too! I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: RGblues

customer_reviews.title: Fillet knif that works, NO PROTECTIVE SHEATH
customer_reviews.text: Just wish it had a sheath to put it in. Comes on cardboard vacuum package so once opened, you have a lose knife to deal with. That is issue with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Long dandy knife .
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this I was afraid it would be a little too long to handle well , but after using it I have to say it deserves all the ratings I read before I selected it . It is my first filleting knife and I don't think I'll need another one .
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knife, Should sell with a sheath!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought that I could get such a high quality fillet knife for such a cheap price. It slices fish up very nicely and has no problem cutting through bone if performed properly. Wish the knife came with a sheath, thankfully the company sells a fitting sheath for a few dollars extra. Buy both!
customer_reviews.author: Mark K

customer_reviews.title: Good knife
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp when I first used it. Got it to butcher my meat chickens and I nearly sliced the chickens whole head off without much effort. I’ve had to sharpen it since but it hasn’t disappointed me. It’s my first fillet knife
customer_reviews.author: VerWe Satisfies

customer_reviews.title: Great all around and sharp!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a larger fillet knife that I have and this is perfect! Makes fish cleaning and preparation a breeze. Well worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: Ninja888

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Fillet knife for the money
customer_reviews.text: If you catch big fish and need a long flexible fillet knife with a great no-slip ergonomic handle this is a great purchase. Long thin blade, very sensitive and very sharp tip. Feeling your way around bones in meat or down the spine and rib cage of a fish makes this a perfect knife to add to your arsenal. Razor sharp right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lingenfelter

customer_reviews.title: Best Fillet Knife I Have Ever Owned!
customer_reviews.text: I have a professional wetstone that make my knifes LITERALLY as sharp as a razor. we tested cutting with one of my knifes and this new 8" fillet knife.... the fillet knife was just as sharp and makes really precise and clean cuts! Im very happy with this seller and this brand of knives. I love it thank you! I will be buying from you again!
customer_reviews.author: Briana M Mann

customer_reviews.title: I saved $130 by not buying a Wustof fillet knife.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good knife for $20, as long as you don't expect it to feel like quality cutlery.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Little too good
customer_reviews.text: I must not be used to good cutlery...nicked a piece of my own finger off real good. Almost scared to use it for fear of slicing a fingertip clean off. Not sure if I'm adult enough for this knife.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sharp
customer_reviews.text: This will cut your finger off if you were careless. I needed a good fillet knife for cutting up freshly caught fish after fishing. This works like a dream. I also use it to trim fat off pork shoulder or anything larger as it is a big blade and did I mention it is sharp?
customer_reviews.author: Kenny30

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp and excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp. Comfy grip, just be careful as to not cut yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: Used it about 5 times to fillet the salmon I catch. Washed right after each usage. Already found rust on the blade.
customer_reviews.author: Aznhotsauce

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: We use this knife to bone out chicken and chops, as well as cutting up melons into bite sized pieces. The knife was shipped sharp.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Good knife but not for fillet
customer_reviews.text: Ergonomically, is very good. Strength of the blade is very good Sharpness, is ok to cut vegetables but I will not consider it a fillet knife.
customer_reviews.author: Pyramids

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, flexible and razor sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome knife. Lightweight, flexible and razor sharp. My go to knife for cleaning and cutting beef tenderloin.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp.....cut my self by barely touching it with little preasure.
customer_reviews.author: Chino121212

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t been able to use it long enough to judge durability but the knife is sharp and fileted my salmon super easy... great for deboning too.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: Most Used Knife In The House!
customer_reviews.text: I think this knife is used more than any other! It is wicked sharp and the handle is comfortable but grippy.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Razor Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Razor sharp when it arrived, perfect design and flexibility for a general purpose fillet knife, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: It's sharp but doesn't have a cover, it's very dangerous
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fillet knife. Extra long. Very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Rich O

customer_reviews.title: Good knife and Made from solid mov cr-18 steel
customer_reviews.text: After get used to from big blade i am editing my original review and would recommend to everyone this knife as the knife edge holding so well after use of 6 month
customer_reviews.author: Ankit

customer_reviews.title: Amazing filet knife
customer_reviews.text: Use this knife to filet fish and couldn’t be happier. It has the perfect amount of flex and stiffness. Holds an edge and easy to sharpen
customer_reviews.author: Natalya

customer_reviews.title: Buy this knife to slice through meat like through warm butter..
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sharp and a true pleasure to work with, a solid addition to your knife repertoire. One slight complaint is that it is just a smidge too long for my taste, but the craftsmanship is so fine that I can't even think to be upset...
customer_reviews.author: Itai Orion

customer_reviews.title: This thing is sharp.
customer_reviews.text: This knife is sharp. dangerously sharp. Warn people before letting them use it sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Bishop

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I have a number of KAI knives and this one equal in quality for $110 less.
customer_reviews.author: Wireless Worker

customer_reviews.title: Save your money look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.text: A boning and fillet knife needs to be flexible, this knife is as as flexible as a rock!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is sharp WARNING !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great fillet knife ..Handel with extreme care and extreme safety, dangerously sharp. Buy a knife sheath/protector for it, not kidding.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lee Little

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knife
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Highly recommended if you need a very sharp, maneuverable fileting knife.
customer_reviews.author: KVC

customer_reviews.title: Novice opinion knife is surated
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t read the description fully, novice fish cleaner it’s surated and was difficult to use
customer_reviews.author: Happy Wife

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Wow this cuts through fish like warm butter. I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: reading

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with product
customer_reviews.text: Great knife. Razor sharp. I have been using it on all manner of large ocean fish. Cleans King salmon quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph VonDoloski

customer_reviews.title: Great knife - no sheath
customer_reviews.text: Nice sharp knife that does an excellent job of filleting fish. I only gave it 4 stars because it didn't come with a sheath, which is badly needed for taking it fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: It’ll do
customer_reviews.text: I expected it to be so sharp it’d cut my eyes if I looked at it. It’s a decent knife though very sturdy feeling not super sharp out the box but can be sharpened
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Best I've bought online.
customer_reviews.text: Cuts fish with ease. Thought this knife would be like just another cheap knife online but I was wrong. I will continue to purchase more of these for my home and t.t.
customer_reviews.author: abiel martinez

customer_reviews.title: Enquiry
customer_reviews.text: * I have bought (MILLENNIA® NARROW BONING KNIFE 8′′) Model and I'm wondering what's the best and correct way to sharpening it ?? * I don't want to sharpening in a wrong way then lost the edge !!??
customer_reviews.author: Anas Yasien

customer_reviews.title: Does it cut it?  Yeah it does.
customer_reviews.text: Needed some additional sharpening but length offers long draw that helps to filet those slipper fish. Comfortable handle and enough flexibility to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Tat Y. Yuen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect knife to cut meat!
customer_reviews.text: except little bit long, this is a perfect knife to cut meat!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Mercer knives are a good deal, price for quality. I have used them, professionally, for years.
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: Filet knife
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's the easiest filetknife I've ever used
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sharpens easily. Cuts perfectly. Easy to clean up. Feels good in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fillet knife
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp fillet knife good weight and seems to be very durable would recommend
customer_reviews.author: timeout

customer_reviews.title: GOOD VALUE, WOULD RECOMMEND AND BUY AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: VERY VERY SHARP, GOOD VALUE, WOULD RECOMMEND AND BUY AGAIN, GOOD AMAZON SELLER
customer_reviews.author: oran hively

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is totally worth it! I use it to filet fish on site and it’s easy to clean and works great
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, sharp enough
customer_reviews.text: Really Sharp , I am not a pro but this is done good
customer_reviews.author: Raj Khanna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic but be careful as it is super sharp
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very good knife I love it just I what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It's very sharp and has a good grip
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Good knife
customer_reviews.text: It's a Mercer... What else can be said in this price range
customer_reviews.author: Chef Joseph Andersen

customer_reviews.title: My son-in-law is a chef and I got it for ...
customer_reviews.text: My son-in-law is a chef and I got it for him as a present He loves it, and used it to cut up an entire pig!
customer_reviews.author: JeanMiller947

customer_reviews.title: Best knife ever
customer_reviews.text: Best knife ever!!. I have owned J.A Henckels and Wusthof knives and these knives are in a league of there own!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The knife is good I would have liked it to come with a sheath.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the knife, wish a case came with it, it's so sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Knife is great but disappointed a blade cover was not included or available
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dang it is sharp!  But it poked "a hole in the bucket, dear Liza"
customer_reviews.text: This knife arrived sharp. I spent a minute sharpening it and then I could shave the hair off my arm with it! My only gripe is that it does not come with a sheath. I did not expect a sheath when I ordered it but when the knife poked a hole in my fishing bucket I was shocked/ticked/sad/confused. So I had to fabricate a thin knife block style sheath out of wood just to be able to take it fishing/camping. Great for a kitchen! Needs a sheath to take it on the go... I hope this helps you make an informed decision, not a deformed incision! ~Mahalo
customer_reviews.author: JCG

customer_reviews.title: Another great Mercer knife
customer_reviews.text: Yikes! Knives scare me! But I’ve learned that the right knife sharpened right is easy to use AND SAFE! This is a great knife for fileting and just that. Fileting includes thin slicing lox and a tenderloin on the slant. Also I have to celebrate Mercer knives. This is my third Mercer after discovering the brand through America’s Test Kitchens. Read the review there of the Mercer bread knife. After that I dare you not to buy Mercer. I’m so happy with mine. Oh and caution family members about using sharp sharp knives. That’s so important.
customer_reviews.author: Dinkydoright

customer_reviews.title: Good luck getting it out of the plastic wrap
customer_reviews.text: I like the knife. It has a good feel. On the other hand, the bleeping plastic that the knife ships in is dangerous. After reading all the reviews where people had sliced their hands on the knife, I was paranoid about how to strip the plastic off without cutting myself. I attacked it with a knife, with scissors, with a thing I use for opening mail, and came to the conclusion that the edges of the bleeping plastic were probably sharper than the knife. The hottest circle of hell should be reserved for whoever came up with that packaging. OK, rant over. I like the knife.
customer_reviews.author: ksteinhoff

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding design and performance!  Price for this level of excellence is fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this fillet knife for everthing from trimming fat off of packer brisket, to filleting fish. Perfect balance and just the right flex in the blade. Easy to sharpen to a razor edge. Price is fantastic for this quality. Handle is comfortable, ergonomic and non-slip. After multiple uses, a quick run through a Chef's Choice sharpener brings it back to a dangerously sharp edge! One of the best I have ever held in my hand...and what a fantastic price for this quality and performance!!! A+++ I will unquestionably buy again if this ever gets so abused that it's time to replace. Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Frank E. TrinkleTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: The handle is just right for me. Easy to hold. Light weight. The blade is flexible and sharp. Did I say sharp? Well, let me tell you about how sharp it is. RIGHT OUT OF THE BOX. When I opened the box and felt the blade for sharpness. I could tell this knife is razor sharp. I pulled a one pound frozen ground beef roll package. I sliced a beef patty from the roll with two strokes of the knife. THAT is what I call sharp. I would definitely recommend this knife to any one. It is a great product. Now I need to find a scabbard for this blade.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Carter Sr

customer_reviews.title: Long enough for Salmon
customer_reviews.text: I buy whole Salmon and Steelhead when it's on sale. With heart issues I no longer have bacon or other cured meats for breakfast, and smoke fresh fish or have oatmeal for breakfast instead. The crappy little 4" Fillet knife that came with the set is too small for anything besides small trout. This blade is nice and sharp, and glides easily across the bones. I suspect I use a fillet knife much more than the average household consumer uses one so to have a nice one is a real treat.
customer_reviews.author: Eric the Tinbender

customer_reviews.title: Love this! But beware!!
customer_reviews.text: REALLY, REALLY, REALLY sharp. I like my kitchen knives sharp, and this one is. It has a good "heft" and is easy to hold and maneuver when filleting meat. I haven't needed to sharpen it, yet, so will do a follow-up review once I've done that. This knife is dangerous, so be very aware when using it. I have sharpened it once, and was very pleased with how well it sharpened. I use this knife a lot. Again, when it is sharp, be VERY aware how you handle it.
customer_reviews.author: LacelleTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Great knife for the price. You can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: This is a great knife. I've used this to carve several different types of me. I trimmed a 17-pound brisket and removed around 4 lb of fat from it. This knife goes to everything like butter. The handle is nice and comfortable and the blade works great
customer_reviews.author: kc2pxp

customer_reviews.title: SHARP
customer_reviews.text: BROKE MY FAVORITE KNIFE & IMMEDIATELY ORDERED THIS ONE. VERY SHARP SO BE CAREFUL WHEN SLICING SOMETHING IN YOUR HANDS. FOUND THAT OUT THE HARD WAY. LUCKILY IT WASN'T DEEP. VERY VERY SHARP. NEXT ONE WILL BE A LITTLE SHORTER FOR VEGGIES
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This fillet knife feels good in the hand, is thin enough to be quite flexible yet it feels sturdy. I have used to the trim fat from meat for the grill and it has performed that function perfectly. I have not used it on fish, but I think it would do the job there as well.
customer_reviews.author: O. Gilley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice knife
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice well made knife and was sharp out of the package. 4 stars only is because it doesn't come with a case or something to hold it while not in use. For the price it should have had something to keep it in.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Blade measure 8.5 not 8 as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Have not used as it just arrived. I would have waited until I used it to rate it except the blade is longer than listed in the write up. Not sure of the maneuverability with the extra .5 inch. It seems sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Yehling

customer_reviews.title: Sharpest Knife I Own
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a knife that was both very sharp and had a good feel when I was holding it. I was not disappointed in this knife at all. It's literally the best filet knife I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Kris4956

customer_reviews.title: Very good fillet knife
customer_reviews.text: Fine fillet knife and I have a few. This may be my best, though cheaper than some. Holds edge reasonably well. Sharpens very well. Good handle. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kramian

customer_reviews.title: Great fillet knife
customer_reviews.text: My first use was on a 24' Walleye that I caught. Did a very good job. I just fixed the fish on Friday and there were no bones. Trimed like a champ
customer_reviews.author: carterrh

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: The knife came very sharp and I was able to fillet a small salmon very easily. I wish they made a blade that's 11' or 12' to fillet a large fish. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MK2007

customer_reviews.title: Beats those electric models hands down.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I need one 2” shorter but will work on Northern. Flexible and sharp.
customer_reviews.author: More sense than money

customer_reviews.title: great affordable knife
customer_reviews.text: Needed a quick touchup on the sharpener out of the box, but other than that this is a great knife, cheap enough that if it falls off the pier I wont be too upset.
customer_reviews.author: Lingwendil

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Blade is very stiff which makes it hard to use correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Very Sharp Right Out of The Package
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with the quality and sharpness for the price. I was on a mission to de-bone a turkey, I had never done this before but needed a Fillet Knife, this worked perfect without a big investment.
customer_reviews.author: dneastme

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Finally an knife that is truly RAZOR sharp. This knife is scary sharp, The only thing that sucks is, it doesn't come with a sheath. A knife this sharp should come with a nice sheath to protect the blade and accidents.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t seen how long it will hold an edge, but scary sharp out of the box. Could use a little more flex in the blade.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Wolter

customer_reviews.title: Great longer fillet knife.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and flexible, very sharp. Put a microbevel on it to prevent it from cutting through the skin. Hones up well. Handle is comfortable. Can become slippery if your hand is oily but with latex gloves on it stays in place. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nace

customer_reviews.title: Nice fillet knife
customer_reviews.text: Works fine on large fish, red snapper. Have not tried to sharpen it yet, so that remains to be seen.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Buy it and be happy!
customer_reviews.text: Cut the edge of my thumb nail smooth! By accident of course. Very sharp!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got this one
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This thing is light saber sharp. Anything you wave it at sliced in half. Great as a boneing knife or trimmer. Just amazing
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp and sturdy. Easy to sharpen and holds the edge
customer_reviews.author: smw

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Sharp. That's all you need to know. I bought a second one so I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Luigi

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, not bad, not great.
customer_reviews.author: diana kach

customer_reviews.title: Cuts anything I want it to cut, even my finger if I don’t watch out
customer_reviews.text: To cut all kind of meats. And I love it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome knife
customer_reviews.text: Awesome knife for the price. Dulls kinda fast, but for the price ill deal with it, i keep a honer right next to me to sharper after i cut.
customer_reviews.author: Tani

customer_reviews.title: Razor Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp! Flayed a few salmin with it, and it did its job very well. Just wish it came with a sheath. Also comes razor sharp. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Vlad Packer

product_meta.title: Mercer Culinary Millennia Narrow Fillet Knife, 8.5-Inch, Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Size:8.5-Inch Narrow Fillet Knife| Design:KnifeWith unparalleled performance, Millennia knives are designed with innovative features to meet the demands of today's professional chefs.
feature_bullets: Ergonomic handle – a combination of Santoprene for comfort and polypropylene for durability
Textured finger points provide slip resistance, grip, and safety. Protective finger guard.
Hand wash knives for blade edge and surface care
The highest quality Japanese steel allows for easy blade maintenance and rapid sharpening for a razor-sharp edge

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars15,775 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
